rules_text:
Effigy {1}{W}{U} [i](If you cast this for its effigy cost, it isn't a creature until you pay its mana cost as a sorcery.)[/i]
Whenever you cast an enchantment spell, draw a card.
flavor_text: [i]“Bestow upon me your blessing, o Vaelios. Let us together rebuild a world of order amidst this vile, depraved chaos.”[/i]
